Got it
How to use the hunger scale
Attempt to start eating when you feel you are at a 3 and stop eating at a 7. This range generally makes people feel the most comfortable.
Scale
Ravenous
Extremely hungry
Hungry
“I could eat”
Neutral
Mild fullness
Satisfied
Slight discomfort
Overstuffed
Physically ill
You can always tap the info icon on this page to access this info again!
Intuitive Eating Assessment Scale
This quiz will assess whether you are an Intuitive Eater, or perhaps where you might need some work.
There will be <font color=%s>4 sections</font>, and you will see your results afterwards.
Assessment adapted from Tracy Tylka
Let\'s go
Does it mostly apply?
Next
Just to make sure
By tapping complete, you will no longer be able to adjust your answers and you will be shown your results.
Results
Low percentages suggest areas that might need more work :)
Back to home
%d<small>%%</small>
Unconditional permission to eat
Eating for physical rather than emotional reasons
Reliance on internal hunger and satiety cues
Body-food choice congruence
I try to avoid certain foods high in fat, carbs, or calories.
If I am craving a certain food, I don’t allow myself to have it.
I get mad at myself for eating something unhealthy.
I have forbidden foods that I don’t allow myself to eat.
I don’t allow myself to eat what food I desire at the moment.
I follow eating rules or diet plans that dictate what, when, and how to eat.
I find myself eating when I’m feeling emotional (e.g., anxious, depressed, sad), even when I’m not physically hungry.
I find myself eating when I am lonely, even when I’m not physically hungry.
I use food to help me soothe my negative emotions.
I find myself eating when I am stressed out, even when I’m not physically hungry.
I am not able to cope with my negative emotions (e.g., anxiety and sadness) without turning to food for comfort.
When I am bored, I eat just for something to do.
When I am lonely, I turn to food for comfort.
I find difficulty finding ways to cope with stress and anxiety, other than by eating.
I trust my body to tell me WHEN to eat.
I trust my body to tell me WHAT to eat.
I trust my body to tell me HOW MUCH to eat.
I rely on my hunger signals to tell me when to eat.
I rely on my fullness (satiety) signals to tell me when to stop eating.
I trust my body to tell me when to stop eating.
Most of the time, I desire to eat nutritious foods.
I mostly eat foods that make my body perform efficiently (well).
I mostly eat foods that give my body energy and stamina.
The tool for becoming the ultimate Intuitive Eater
Welcome back!
Enter your email and password below.
Email address
Invalid credentials.
Welcome!
To provide you with relevant tools in your Intuitive Eating journey, we will be using machine learning to monitor your progress.
If you’re okay with this, please continue to the disclaimer!
Tools adapted from Evelyn Tribole and Elyse Resch’s model of Intuitive Eating
Disclaimer
This app is not appropriate if you are experiencing symptoms of an eating disorder. Click here if you are not sure.
here
I do not experience having symptoms of an eating disorder and choose to continue using the app.
Please check off everything that applies to you:
Do you make yourself sick because you feel uncomfortably full?
Do you worry you have lost control over how much you eat?
Do you believe yourself to be fat when others say you are too thin?
Have you recently lost more than 14 pounds in a 3-month period?
Would you say that food dominates your life?
Complete
We\'d really love to have you here…
We advise you for now not to use our app because we are unable to support you in the areas you indicated.
Please consult a dietitian or medical professional before further use.
Exit App
Hello, you\'re new!
Enter a valid email and a password that includes a symbol or a number and is 8 or more characters long.
Password
Create account
Sign in
Done
How would you like us to address you?
A first name or even a nickname works for us!
Name
What is your age?
A friendly reminder that we only use your age to personalize our tools to the stage in your life.
Under 18
Between 18 and 25
Over 25
How can we help you feel your best?
Select a goal that we can help you achieve. We’ll create a plan for you!
I want to improve my ability to honour my hunger and satiety.
I want to learn to integrate my fear foods back into my intake.
I want to get better at detaching eating from emotional reasons.
I want to learn to eat in a way that supports my physical health.
Tell us why
Research says that when you know your intentions, you’ve taken the 1st step to reaching your goal.
Tell us why you have chosen to embark on this journey with us.
I want to feel relaxed when I am around food…
Today
